title: Trump nominates Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as Federal Reserve chair
description: Bush economic advisor Kevin Warsh is set to succeed Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve, President Trump announced Friday.

title: Meta and Microsoft both blew their data center budgets last quarter. Wall Street is only mad at one of them.
description: The Big Tech rivals are spending more than ever, but analysts are more concerned about Microsoft at the moment.

title: Meta earnings updates: Wall Street is focused on AI capex heading into Q4 results
description: Meta will report earnings for Q4 after the closing bell on Wednesday. The company will hold a call with analysts at 4:30 p.m. ET.

title: Tesla Q4 earnings updates: Wall Street analysts are jittery over sales slump, AI roadmap
description: Tesla will report Q4 earnings results after the 4 p.m. closing bell. The company will hold a call with analysts discussing the results at 5:30 pm ET.

title: 'Shoulder to shoulder with Michael Burry': A day trader details his bearish thesis on one of the Reddit crowd's favorite stocks
description: Palantir is a darling of the Reddit day-trader crowd. One everyday investor unpacks why he isn't buying the hype.

title: Microsoft says OpenAI is driving 45% of the backlog for Azure cloud computing
description: OpenAI and Microsoft have a reconfigured relationship. The software giant revealed just how much OpenAI is driving its RPO.

title: What to expect from January's Fed meeting as Powell faces looming DOJ probe
description: The Federal Reserve will likely hold rates steady at its January meeting, even as Jerome Powell faces mounting pressure from Trump amid the DOJ probe.

title: The headlines to look out for as Big Tech reports earnings
description: Seven companies with market caps totalling more than $20 trillion are checking in. I broke down what to keep an eye out for with each of them.

title: I struggled to find a job after taking the federal buyout last year. I had to expand my search nationwide to land my next role.
description: Jide Adebowale navigated a challenging job market after leaving his federal job in 2025. He ultimately found a tech role in Northern Virginia.

title: Status, networking, and longevity: Why Wall Streeters love expensive gyms and workout classes
description: It's no secret that expensive gyms and fitness classes are filled with people who work in high-paying industries like finance and tech. But why?
